snippet: Russia has argued that the West should not support popular uprisings against dictatorships in the Middle East lest Islamic fundamentalism take hold.
lead_paragraph: Russia has argued that the West should not support popular uprisings against dictatorships in the Middle East lest Islamic fundamentalism take hold.

headline.seo: Russians Say Attack in Libya Vindicates Their Position
headline.main: Russians Say Anti-U.S. Attack in Libya Vindicates Their Position
headline.print_headline: Russians Say Anti-U.S. Attack in Libya Vindicates Their Position
